quizData.question: This device is capable of creating connections between two of more interlinked nodes.

quizData.answer: The paths in the circuit are separated from one another spatially
choices: The paths in the circuit are separated from one another spatially
It uses time-division multiplexing (TDM) inside a switch
It is a source or a destination needs to have a global address
It is actually used for data transfer

quizData.question: Which if the following statments best describes the User Datagram protocol?
quizData.answer: It is a non-frills transport protocol that does not establish connection and does not attempt to keep data packets in sequence
choices: It is a non-frills transport protocol that does not establish connection and does not attempt to keep data packets in sequence
It performs error reporting for the Internet Protocol and is commonly used by routers
It is another small but important protocol that is used to support TCP/IP networks
It is the most popular protocol that handles dynamic assignment

quizData.question: It is the most popular protocol that handles IP assignment.

quizData.answer: Each packet is treated independently of all others
choices: Each packet is treated independently of all others

It is normally implemented in the data-link layer
It is a non-frills transport protocol that does not establish connection and does not attempt to keep data packets in sequence

quizData.question: In switching fabrics, which of the following statements is TRUE  about the crossbar switch.
quizData.answer: It is the simplest type of switching fabrics
choices: It is the simplest type of switching fabrics
It is a multistage switch with microswitches at each stage that route the packets based on the output port represented as a binary string

quizData.question: This protocol lets a router represent an entire local area network to the Internet as a single IP address.
choices: Tunneling Protocols and Virtual Private Networks

quizData.question: Which of the following statements is TRUE  about the time-division switch?
quizData.answer: It uses time-division multiplexing inside a switch
choices: It uses time-division multiplexing inside a switch
The paths in the circuit are separated from one another spatially
It combines the two results in switches that are optimized both physically (the number of crosspoints) and temporally (the amount of delay)
It is normally implemented in the data-link layer

quizData.question: Which if the following statements best describe Virtual Private Network (VPN)?
quizData.answer: It is a data network connection that makes use of the public telecommunication infrastructure but maintain privacy using a tunneling protocol and security procedures
choices: It is a data network connection that makes use of the public telecommunication infrastructure but maintain privacy using a tunneling protocol and security procedures
It is the command set that allows an organization to create secure connections using public resources such as the Internet
It uses time-division multiplexing inside a switch
The paths in the circuit are separated from one another spatially

The TCP header attaches a port address indicates a particular application on a machine
